mapper.select: select superior from goods_spu where id = #{id}
select max(price) from goods_sku where spu_id = #{id}
select min(price) from goods_activity where sku_id in (select id from goods_sku where spu_id = #{id}) and activity_open = 1 and activity_stock > sold and (NOW() BETWEEN start_time and end_time)
select min(price) from goods_sku where spu_id = #{id}
select min(gift_point) from goods_sku where spu_id = #{id}

SELECT CONCAT('促销：','满',di.condition_amount,'减',di.deduction_amount) promotion FROM goods_spu spu LEFT JOIN division_spu dis ON spu.id = dis.goods_id LEFT JOIN divisions di ON dis.division_id = di.division_id where di.open_reduction = 1 and (now() BETWEEN di.start_time and di.end_time) and di.show_type = 1 and spu.id = #{id}

SELECT IFNULL(min(act.present_coin),min(sku.gift_point)) FROM goods_spu spu LEFT JOIN goods_sku sku ON spu.id = sku.spu_id LEFT JOIN goods_activity act ON act.sku_id = sku.id AND activity_open = 1 AND NOW() BETWEEN act.start_time AND act.end_time AND activity_stock > sold WHERE spu.id = #{id} GROUP BY spu.id
